response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but recognizing its potential worth to you, we aim to bridge the gap between our interests and yours. We are offering the product to you at a special price of $950,000, which reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who truly appreciates its true value. We believe this offer presents a unique chance for both parties to achieve a mutually beneficial outcome. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
